```{r, echo=TRUE}
library(XML)
library(RCurl)
library(stringr)

```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
# read all rookie stats in
data <- read.csv('AllRookieDataWithURL.csv')
```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
# get urls from br_url column
all_urls <- as.vector(unique(data$br_url))
# get the length of urls
nurls <- length(all_urls)
# create a dataframe for players with international and NCAA experience a
intl_df <- data.frame(matrix(ncol = 3, nrow = nurls))
cbb_df <- data.frame(matrix(ncol = 3, nrow = nurls))
```

```{r, echo=TRUE}

for (i in 1:4) {
  # get the appopriate url address
  u <- paste0("https://www.basketball-reference.com/international/players/",
            all_urls[i],".html")
  if (url.exists(url = u)) {
    download.file(u, destfile = paste0("group_project/international.html"))
    doc <- htmlParse("group_project/international.html")
    g <- getNodeSet(doc, "//*[@id='totals-all-reg']/tfoot/tr/td[4]")
    mp <- getNodeSet(doc, "//*[@id='totals-all-reg']/tfoot/tr/td[5]")
    (intl_df[i, ] <- c(all_urls[i], as.numeric(xmlValue(g[[1]])),
                       as.numeric(xmlValue(mp[[1]]))))
    # (minutes[i] <- as.numeric(xmlValue(mp[[1]])))
    free(doc)
  }
}

```
```{r, echo=TRUE}
# Scrape college careers

# get the length of urls
for (i in 1:5) {
  # get the appopriate url address
  u <- paste0("https://sports-reference.com/cbb/players/",
              all_urls[i],".html")
  if (url.exists(url = u)) {
    download.file(u, destfile = paste0("group_project/cbb.html"))
    doc <- htmlParse("group_project/cbb.html")
    g <- getNodeSet(doc, "//*[@id='players_per_game']/tfoot/tr/td[3]")
    mp <- getNodeSet(doc, "//*[@id='players_per_game']/tfoot/tr/td[5]")
    (cbb_df[i, ] <- c(all_urls[i], as.numeric(xmlValue(g[[1]])),
                     as.integer(as.numeric(xmlValue(mp[[1]])
                                           ) * 
                                  as.numeric(xmlValue(g[[1]])
                                             )
                                  )
                      )
      )
    # (minutes[i] <- as.numeric(xmlValue(mp[[1]])))
    free(doc)
  }
}
```
